stationery.name: Brown Envelopes
stationery.description: Gusseted kraft envelopes for sending samples and printed matter by courier.

Sample Order Entry in DON
1 order includes 100 envelopes

stationery.name: Mailing Label Sheet
stationery.description: Small mailing labels should be applied only to the kraft envelope. One sheet includes sixteen self-adhesive labels.
stationery.quantity: Include the number of sheets required in request to facilities
stationery.Note:
Mailing label template must be downloaded from Intranet to correctly print label.

stationery.name: Kraft Envelope
stationery.description: 7.5" x 3.75" in kraft envelopes used for annoucements, invitations, holiday cards and notecards.
stationery.quantity: Include the number of envelopes required in request to facilities

stationery.name: Rubber Bands
stationery.description: Maharam's rubber band should be used with two or more  gusseted kraft envelopes for delivery to a client.

1 order includes 25 rubber bands

stationery.name: Notecard Set
stationery.description: Notecards featuring distinct graphic directions united by pastel and fluorescent color. The back of the cards may be used for handwritten notes that are mailed inside an accompanying envelope, or included loosely with a sample delivery or gift.
stationery.Note:
Sample order through DON
